backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user registration, session management, and message storage with blob storage mixin; includes a placeholder math solver endpoint that delegates evaluation to the TypeScript client.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed rebranding tasks that changed "Hollow AI" to "Axora AI" across frontend files (index.html, Header.tsx, App.tsx, ChatView.tsx).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the dark-themed Axora AI application with math solver, translator, media gallery, chat interface, and authentication features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space with deep blacks, dark grays, and vibrant accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with "Axora AI" page title and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing authentication with Internet Identity, rendering login screen for unauthenticated users, and tabbed interface with sidebar for authenticated users accessing math solver, translator, and media features.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar component displaying chat session list with timestamps, new chat button, and session selection using React Query hooks for data fetching.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface rendering message history with user/AI avatars, textarea input with keyboard shortcuts, and simulated AI responses for selected session.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying the Axora AI logo, title, theme toggle button (light/dark mode), and a sign-out button for authenticated users using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver component that accepts mathematical expressions, evaluates them client-side, and generates step-by-step solutions tailored to selected grade levels (K-2 through 11-12).
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Media gallery component with tabs for images and videos, supporting AI generation via prompts and file uploads with simulated progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Chat-style translator component that displays translation history with source and target language selection from 12 supported languages, using a custom translation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Hook managing chat sessions with queries for fetching user sessions and mutations for adding messages, including automatic user registration and session creation functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Custom React hook that manages AI-generated images and videos with mock generation logic using canvas to create placeholder media with gradient backgrounds and text overlays.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Custom React hook for managing translation functionality with mock translation logic that handles common phrases in 12 languages and maintains translation history.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables for a dark theme with teal primary and coral accent colors, and importing Inter and Poppins fonts.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module exporting a `cn` function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional className merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, extended utilities, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the application state, features, and requirements for 'Axora AI' (formerly 'Hollow AI'), an educational AI app with media generation, math solving, translation, and chat history features.
